attributes.action: Honour the 2 remaining world war one heroes on the Queens birthday list.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The 2 remaining world war one heroes, Henry Allingham and Harry patch, fought bravely to save this country. They should be honoured for their courage, heroism and selflessness. THey will not be around much longer and we owe men like them a huge debt for our freedom.

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.direct.gov.uk/honours
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
